name: Check eligibility of customer to order a Card Reader - Customer has mutiple eligible cards but not eligible to

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier

And I locate a customer using the following criteria:
| registrationNumber | type |
| 68600751 | Personal |

children.description: Locate by data: | registrationNumber | type | | 68600751 | Personal |

testSteps.description: And I have a valid customer token for customer "0100000939540494000"
And I authenticate the Customer "0100000939540494000" to authentication level 1 using a customer token

children.description: Update customer token with cust key: 0100000939540494000, KNOWN

testSteps.description: When I check the eligibility of customer "0100000939540494000" to order a Card Reader
Then I should receive back a successful response

And the following Customer Card Reader information should be returned
| eligibleToOrder | pacStatus | customerCardReaderProfileLocked | hasNoActivatedCardAndNoEligibleDebitCardToUseWithCardReader | cardReaderCustomer | customerCardReaderProfileStatusActive | numberOfCardReadersOrdered |
| false | PAC Suspended | false | false | false | null | 0 |

children.description: Validate customer card reader info: | eligibleToOrder | pacStatus | customerCardReaderProfileLocked | hasNoActivatedCardAndNoEligibleDebitCardToUseWithCardReader | cardReaderCustomer | customerCardReaderProfileStatusActive | numberOfCardReadersOrdered | | false | PAC Suspended | false | false | false | null | 0 |
